hackathon-description-text: On December 2nd 2017, we are hosting MLH Local Hack Day at University of Toronto, Scarborough co-hosted by Ryerson University Students for 12 hours! This is the single largest day of student hacking ever and we are inviting you to join us!

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Head Organizer at UTSC + Ryerson Local Hack Day | Organizer at Hack the 6ix and Hack the Valley | Webmaster at Project Include Skule
Organizer at UTSC + Ryerson Local Hack Day | Former Software Developer Intern at Knockri
Organizer at UTSC + Ryerson Local Hack Day
Organizer at UTSC + Ryerson Local Hack Day
Volunteer at UTSC + Ryerson Local Hack Day | Web Support at Treasury Board Secretariat Ontario
Consultant at WCG: The IT Exchange Inc.

hackathon-eligibility:
As long as you're 15 years old or older and enrolled in any college, university, or high school, you're eligible to apply!
Teams up to a maximum of four (4) people.
All hacks must be built onsite at "University of Toronto + Ryerson University Local Hack Day" by registered participants. Unregistered hackers will not be allowed to participate.
Remote participation is not allowed.
hackathon-rules:
Please follow MLH Code of Conduct, 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $500.00 Indico API Credits and $500.00 DigitalOcean Credits for each member of the team. Google Home Mini for each person. Automatic acceptance into PennApps Retro
$250.00 Indico API Credits and $250.00 DigitalOcean Credits for each member of the team. Automatic acceptance into Hack the Valley II. Amazon Dot per team member.
$100.00 Indico API Credits and $125.00 DigitalOcean Credits for each member of the team. Portable Speakers for each team member. Automatic acceptance into RUHacks 2018
Annual license of the Maple Student Edition for each member of the team!
A Year of Wolfram|One Personal Edition plus a one-year subscription to Wolfram|Alpha Pro!
Annual license of Jet Brain software of the tools/IDE's for each member of the team!
Annual subscription to Momentum Plus for each member of the team!
$150.00 Amazon Gift Card split across all the team members!
